name: Wanderfish
description:
Attention Mac Users:
For some reason we can't figure out, keyboard events don't seem to work. You will have to rely on playing with the mouse.

Before we begin: 
Please make sure that hardware acceleration is enabled in your browser. It should be by default, but if you're experiencing lag, try to enable it.

In untitled fish game, fish want to move from one pond to another! However, they will never do so alone.

This is a puzzle game! If you want to learn the mechanics of the game by playing it, don't read farther than this line and stay away from the Instructions button. Check out the controls in game :)

Controls

Left Click - Place down tiles.
Q & E - Rotate Tiles
Backspace, Delete, X & Right Click - Delete Tiles

Game Mechanics
  • Fish take the shortest path possible
  • When there are multiple paths with the same length, the fish will split up on their way to the goal
  • A fisherman will catch one passing fish
  • All river tiles need to be connected.
